original_text: And Sarai said unto Abram, My wrong be upon thee: I have given my maid into thy bosom; and when she saw that she had conceived, I was despised in her eyes: the Lord judge between me and thee.
korean_text: 사래가 아브람에게 이르되 내가 받는 모욕은 당신이 받아야 옳도다 내가 나의 여종을 당신의 품에 두었거늘 그가 자기의 임신함을 알고 나를 멸시하니 당신과 나 사이에 여호와께서 판단하시기를 원하노라

sentences.original_text: I have given my maid into thy bosom
and when she saw that she had conceived
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그녀가 임신한 것을 보았을 때

sentences.original_text: I was despised in her eyes
the Lord judge between me and thee
